comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Bitcoin creator do not control bitcoin, no one controls bitcoin.It is because bitcoin is the first cryptocurrency but not only that. Bitcoin has the strongest blockchain, some people prefer it because of that. Bitcoin has a limited supply. What is scarce is actually money that will increase in value.

comments.body: Understand first what you're talking. Bitcoin is not mysterious, you can read its whitepaper and why it is made, and its purpose. Altcoins may vary to its purpose, those who have strong foundation last thats why people still using them while on the other hand most of them now are useless, scam, spam, etc.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Bitcoin's the prototype for a blockchain based digital currency.Most prototypes aren't thrown out but are used to develop things on and add things to. That's why bitcoin is the most valued cryptocurrency and why it's also one of the most secure and most trusted (it might still be trying to prove itself to some too).There's a chance an altcoin might overtake bitcoin (again) but there's no reason things implemented on other chains can't be added to bitcoins.

comments.body: Being the firstborn means a lot and that's why it's still in the top. Also, the algo that it got, PoW is one of the most secured way of maintaining the network and that's why many are trusting it.Unlike those new projects and altcoins that has developers on their side ready to maintain and upgrade it, bitcoin remains to be a decentralized project and that's why it is trustless and it has a fixed supply of 21M for which many have been lost forever that adds to its ecosystem and treated as burned bitcoins forever.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: The only thing we don't know about bitcoin is its creator which is not important at all. The rest is all known so there is no "mystery" in bitcoin because it is 100% open source so it can all be seen.The answer to your question is pretty simple, it is because there hasn't been any alternate cryptocurrency created that could perform half the things bitcoin does. Majority of them have serious flaws, like the security bugs in ethereum protocol; a large number of them are centralized and shady and most of them are useless. In other words bitcoin has not had any competition ever since its creation.
